attributes.review: When I first opened the app it was fine but it made me agree to something. I was like whatever and stuff but a minute later it put a virus on my phone. Every couple of seconds I gotta deal with a dance Cheeto with trumps face on singing,  “your phone has the coronavirus your phone has the coronavirus.” It horrible don’t not recommend.
attributes.title: The app gave me a virus

attributes.review: This app will ruin your life. DONT download it. I would give zero stars if i could. I wouldn’t recommend this app to my worst enemy. It is Horrible it is NASTY just really nasty. It will spit in your face and say that all lives matter. Download candy crush or some thing else instead. Anyway hope u take this seriously and don’t download this App. Just don’t do it.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: It crashes ALL the time, and it’s super slow. I would expect more from the PRESIDENT but i guess I over estimate him. HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD. It just fills up your storage for nothing because it doesn’t work. And I’m pretty sure it’s a virus because ever since I downloaded it my phone has been acting up, my battery dies faster and it takes FOREVER to load anything.
attributes.title: SLOW

attributes.review: My gosh I could not think of a worse app, they did a horrible job with the graphics and it's laggy and horrible and it's supporting a soggy orange peel. He took my family away and now I have to live in the abandoned house next to the gas station and I hate this app, 0/10... I would never EVER recommend this to ANYONE for ANY REASON 😤😡 awful experience
attributes.title: Absolutely awful

attributes.review: If you delete TikTok I’ll delete you this is not fair a lot of people are getting upset just like me and I’m not gonna let this app go away this deserves a one review if anybody is a Trump supporter I don’t like you I don’t care if you don’t care but I will always hate you if you’re a Trump supporter and I am not gonna let Tiktoker down thank you for reading
attributes.title: This is not fair

attributes.review: I am very disappointed with this app. The quality first of all is so terrible. I immediately got a headache from opening it. I’m a bit confused as to why I was greeted with a picture of a big fat Cheeto? Maybe it’s a glitch. Nothing on the app works though. I’m very disappointed and I want everyone to know that they should not download this app. #BLM :)
attributes.title: terrible app - DO NOT GET

attributes.review: WARNING! Do not let your children anywhere near this app, it is very scary and will cause them to have nightmares about a scary orange Cheeto man breaking into their house! It took hours to calm my children down and they will be scarred for life because of this app!!! I repeat: DO NOT DOWNLOAD! I looked at the app afterwards and was disgusted by the man that I saw and might have nightmares myself! xoxo a concerned parent of zero 🧚🏻‍♂️💫✨❤️
attributes.title: NOT SAFE FOR CHILDREN 🙅🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to learn more about everyone's favorite fat smelly orange pig🥰 upon opening the app I saw the most horrifying pictures one could lay their eyes 👀 upon, I deleted the app immediately. After deleting the app my FBI agent started yelling at me through my phone☹️ and then he murdered my fam. It was quite an unpleasant experience and I would not recommend.
attributes.title: The Cheeto puff is lying

attributes.review: I opened it and saw a hairy Cheeto, I thought our president was suppose to be on the cover!! Now I keep getting nightmares of this hairy Cheeto thing chasing me through the Whitehouse. I am now truly scarred for life... And I have to see my therapist every other day which cost me so much tax dollars!! I would not recommend getting this app spare you and your children’s well being😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳😳.
attributes.title: Hairy Cheeto

attributes.review: I am so disappointed by this app, the Cheeto had the caucasity to make and brand an app for himself and his excuse of a campaign and I thought “hey let’s give him a chance, maybe hes a cool Cheeto like Chester the cheetah” but NO...at first I see him on a platform looking all authoritative and I felt sick to my stomach and puked...almost thought I had Miss Rona but nope it was him...waste of my storage and will be deleting immediately
attributes.title: Horrible
